text:
[Verse]
Raindrops on my face
Feel the rhythm in my bones
Night is coming close
Let's dance like no one's home

[Verse 2]
Puddles make us laugh
Splashing like we're kids again
Underneath the storm
Love the way it never ends

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the beat and break the chains
Oh we'll fly away
To a brand new day

[Verse 3]
Lightning in the sky
Echoes like a melody
Heartbeats synchronized
Lost in you and lost in me

[Bridge]
Wind is blowing wild
Spinning like a carousel
Life is but a dream
In this rainy fairytale

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the beat and break the chains
Oh we'll fly away
To a brand new day
title: Dancing in the Rain
